title: Leonardo's Shadow: Or, My Astonishing Life as Leonardo da Vinci's Servant
description: Set in Milan, 1947, Giacomo, servant to Leonardo da Vinci, is worried about their future when he is informed that a deadline for da Vinci's greatest work has been given by the Duke of Milan and, failing to complete the project, may lead to the ruin of the artist and many of those connected with him.
author: Christopher Peter Grey
